main.name: Atul Kumar Awasthi
main.bio: Hi there! I'm Atul. I have 1 year of experience as a Front-end developer. Curious to explore web and work on as Full-stack dev. I am quick learner and hope to achieve my goals through sheer hard work. I'm curious by nature and have a thirst for knowledge and like to learn more and more at any point in time. I also keep upgrading my skill-set, which I leverage to take myself to newer heights.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Working on a parenting website. We provide content directly to consumers (D2C) and which helps to make Mama's lifestyle easier and helps to diagnose their baby's health. Used Razzel to build the web and Vitest for unit testing to improve the SEO performance and web efficiency by 45%. Here responsible for building the web view infrastructure for millions of users to get a seem-less experience with the minimum response time at the leading content-providing parenting company.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Building on the client's live website, in which adding some features in the live chatBox module, customized responsive UI. Add a feature that improves the SEO performance and user view. Handling server-side rendering (SSR) using express.js. Handle AWS server for deploying code on production and development server.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Built the interactive Dashboard and added some high-impact features that improve the efficiency of the application by more than 70%. Responsible for enhancing and maintaining the UI and applications.

projects.title: Airbnb-clone (React JS, Next Js, Server Side Rendering,  Tailwind css)
E-commerce site (React JS, Next Js, Redux, NextAuth, Tailwind css)
A business page (React JS, Vite, Tailwind CSS)
Slack-on (React JS, Next Js, Styled Components, Firebase-db)
Messenger (React JS, Next Js, SSR, Firebase)

testimonials.text: “Winners never quit, and quitters never win.”
